name: CGBitmapInfo
desc: Component information for a bitmap image.

items.name: static var alphaInfoMask: CGBitmapInfo
items.desc: The alpha information mask. Use this to extract alpha information that specifies whether a bitmap contains an alpha channel and how the alpha channel is generated.

items.name: static var floatComponents: CGBitmapInfo
items.desc: The components of a bitmap are floating-point values.

items.name: static var byteOrderMask: CGBitmapInfo
items.desc: The byte ordering of pixel formats.
